title: The Three Corner Stones of Developerhood
description:
As a developer, there are just some things you can’t do without. I have found that there are three things that I need. Really need. If one of them is missing, I have trouble doing my job properly.
I call them “The Three Corner stones of Developerhood”: ~
1. Coffee Most importantly coffee. I just can’t do without it. I don’t drink it to stay awake or anything, but it’s just a warm beverage that keeps me focused and gives me the energy I need to keep working.
